This module implements Puyo Puyo simulators.

Compile Options:

OptionDescriptionDefault
-d:pon2.path=<str>URI path of the web simulator./pon2/
See also the backend-specific documentation.

Imports

key, nazopuyo, ../core/cell, ../core/field, ../core/fieldtype, ../core/fqdn, ../core/moveresult, ../core/nazopuyo, ../core/pair, ../core/pairposition, ../core/position, ../core/puyopuyo, ../core/requirement, ../core/rule, ../private/intrinsic, ../private/misc, ../private/core/field/avx2/disappearresult

Types

Simulator = ref object
Puyo Puyo simulator. 
SimulatorEditing = object
  cell*: Cell
  field*: tuple[row: Row, column: Column]
  pair*: tuple[index: Natural, axis: bool]
  focusField*: bool
  insert*: bool
Editing information. 
SimulatorKind {.pure.} = enum
  Regular = "r", Nazo = "n"
simulator kind. 
SimulatorMode {.pure.} = enum
  Play = "p", PlayEditor = "pe", Edit = "e", View = "v"
simulator mode. 
SimulatorState {.pure.} = enum
  Stable, WillDisappear, WillDrop
Simulator state.

Consts

SimulatorUriPath {.define: "pon2.path".} = "/pon2/"

proc pairsPositions=(self: Simulator; pairsPositions: PairsPositions) {.inline,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}

func parseSimulator(query: string; fqdn: IdeFqdn): Simulator {.inline,
    ...raises: [ValueError, KeyError, ValueError, ValueError], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the simulator converted from the URI query. If the URI is invalid, ValueError is raised. If the FQDN is not Pon2, the kind is set to Regular, and the mode is set to Play. 
proc parseSimulator(uri: Uri): Simulator {.inline,
    ...raises: [ValueError, KeyError], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the simulator converted from the URI. If the URI is invalid, ValueError is raised.
